posts.post_title: 1888 Allen Ginter James Ryan BVG 6 For Sale Or Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Addie_Joss
Graded a 6 by Beckett. Looking for 1000 or a trade. I'm mainly interested in trading for a Mayo, OJ HOFers in 3-4 range, or Cobb and Wagner cards. Also Very interested in Plank, Joss, and Grover Alexander cards. E-mail me with any questions or offers. I'm a reasonable man.
